Mayor & City Council
====================

Regular Meetings
----------------

* 6:30 p.m.
* The 2nd and 4th Mondays of every month
* Municipal Building  
  3800 University Boulevard  
  West University Place, TX 77005

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval.

[View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes](https://westutx.gov/AgendaCenter/City-Council-2)

Members
-------

* [Susan Sample, Mayor](https://www.westutx.gov/Directory.aspx?EID=72)
* [John Barnes, Mayor Pro Tem](https://westutx.gov/Directory.aspx?EID=200)
* [Clay Brett, Council Member](https://westutx.gov/Directory.aspx?EID=153)
* [Kalie Jackura Rainsberger, Council Member](https://westutx.gov/Directory.aspx?EID=201)
* [John Bertini, Council Member](https://westutx.gov/Directory.aspx?EID=202)

About the Council
-----------------

The City Council consists of the Mayor and four Council Members. West University Place is among the few cities with a true citizen legislature. The City Council is elected on a non-partisan basis. Elections are held in May of odd-numbered years and members serve a term of two years. Members can’t serve for more than 3 successive terms in each office.

Council Authority
-----------------

The City Council has the authority to:

* Adopt budgets
* Appoint the following positions:
  + City Attorney
  + City Manager
  + City Secretary
  + City Municipal Court Judges
  + Prosecutors
* Enact legislation
* Establish policies

More Information
----------------

For more information regarding the West University Place City Council, please contact the [City Secretary](https://westutx.gov/Directory.aspx?DID=6) at 713.662.5813. You can also view[City Council History (PDF)](https://westutx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/294).

![Photo of the West University Place City Council.](https://westutx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=10891)

Top Row (L-R): Council Member Clay Brett, Mayor Pro Tem John Barnes. Bottom Row (L-R): Council Member Kalie Jackura Rainsberger, Mayor Susan Sample, Council Member John Bertini.
